alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:48AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fillmore County through 830 AM CDT... At 747 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milligan, or 24 miles south of York, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Fillmore County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
